name: Effect: All This Has Happened Before

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.All This Has Happened Before]

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering initiative roll. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Quickened] for 1 round and can use your extra action only to Recall Knowledge or Step

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide

rules.uuid: Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: All This Has Happened Before (Initiative)
